Finds if a method is a property getter.

Parameters:

isAssessorName

public static boolean isAssessorName(java.lang.String prefix,
                                     java.lang.String name)
Finds if a name is an accessor name.

Parameters:
prefix - Prefix for the accessor (get, set, is)
name - Method name.
Returns:
Returns true if the name is a possible accessor name.

isSetter

public static boolean isSetter(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
Finds if a method is a property setter.

Parameters:
method -
Returns:

propertyName

public static java.lang.String propertyName(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
Finds the property name for a property accessor method.

Parameters:
method - Property accessor.
Returns:
If the specified method is a property accessor, then returns the name of the property. If the specified method is not a property accessor, returns null..
